content: **2x2** **- a classic beanie from your favorite sock yarn** *this beanie is clean and classic nothing fancy in itself but perfect for showing off your fancy hand-dyed yarn it has a wide cuff for extra warmth over the ears and is stretchy enough to fit most adult heads i made mine out of hedgehog fiber sock in the color way concrete but i m sure it will turn out beautifully from other finger- ing weight yarns as well * finished dimensions finished blocked circumference 51 cm 20 total length 27cm 10 3/5 cuff 7cm 2 3/4 materials 230m 250 yards of hedgehog fibers sock or corresponding fingering weight yarn needles 2mm us0 40cm 16 circular needles 2mm us0 double pointed needles or required size to meet gauge gauge 37 sts 50rows / 10cm 4 in 2x2 ribbing blocked for more information look at my blog lineandsurface wordpress com 1 1 http //lineandsurface wordpress com
